title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the EdgeAICompiler, including supported deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, ONNX), target edge devices (e.g., Raspberry Pi, NVIDIA Jetson, Google Coral, mentioning specific models or versions where applicable), optimization techniques (e.g., quantization, pruning, model compression, providing brief explanations for each technique), performance goals (e.g., inference latency, memory footprint, power consumption, providing reasonable and achievable targets for each goal), and other relevant requirements such as security (mention specific standards like TLS 1.2 or OAuth 2.0), privacy (discuss anonymization and pseudonymization strategies), regulatory compliance (refer to specific regulations like GDPR or CCPA, if applicable), usability (provide guidelines for user interaction and interface design), scalability (discuss how the system should handle increasing model sizes and complexities), and maintainability (outline strategies for efficient code maintenance and updates).

title: Design Compiler Architecture
description: Design a modular, extensible, and scalable architecture for the EdgeAICompiler. The design should incorporate best practices in compiler design, focusing on parsing and lexing, intermediate representation, optimization passes, code generation, target-specific optimizations for edge devices, error handling, edge cases, and performance optimizations. Break down this task into manageable subtasks (e.g., Parsing, Lexing, Intermediate Representation, Optimization Passes, Code Generation, Error Handling, Target-Specific Optimizations for Edge Devices) and ensure adherence to project requirements and standards. Provide clear documentation for each subtask, focusing on design decisions, trade-offs, potential risks, and expected timelines. Include a detailed plan for testing and validation of the architecture design. Update the task where necessary to reflect these changes. Once the updated task is ready, assign it to the appropriate team member (e.g., task-decomposer).

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the frontend component of the compiler, responsible for parsing deep learning models and converting them into an intermediate representation.

title: Implement Optimization Techniques
description: Develop optimization techniques for efficient execution on edge devices, such as quantization, pruning, and kernel fusion.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend component of the compiler, responsible for generating optimized code for target edge devices.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the EdgeAICompiler project.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the EdgeAICompiler, including user guides, API references, and developer documentation.

title: Implement Testing Framework
description: Develop a testing framework for the EdgeAICompiler, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance benchmarks.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit of the EdgeAICompiler to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
